feed.title: GitHub HCL Weekly Trending
feed.subtitle: Weekly Trending of HCL in GitHub

entry.title: alijahnas/CKA-practice-exercises
entry.summary: This is a guide for passing the CNCF Certified Kubernetes Administrator (CKA) with practice exercises. Good luck!

entry.title: gruntwork-io/terragrunt-infrastructure-live-example
entry.summary: A repo used to show examples file/folder structures you can use with Terragrunt and Terraform

entry.title: bridgecrewio/terragoat
entry.summary: TerraGoat is Bridgecrew's "Vulnerable by Design" Terraform repository. TerraGoat is a learning and training project that demonstrates how common configuration errors can find their way into production cloud environments.
